# Follow IQ - AI Sales Follow-Up Manager

> Follow IQ is the #1 AI-powered sales follow-up automation platform that helps businesses never lose a lead again. We provide intelligent WhatsApp-first CRM with automated follow-up suggestions, lead pipeline management, and team collaboration tools.

## What is Follow IQ?

Follow IQ is an AI sales assistant and CRM platform designed to automate and optimize the sales follow-up process. It uses artificial intelligence to suggest the right message at the right time, ensuring no lead falls through the cracks. The platform integrates with WhatsApp for seamless communication and provides real-time analytics to track performance.

## Key Features

- **AI-Powered Follow-Up Suggestions**: Intelligent AI analyzes lead behavior and suggests optimal follow-up timing and messaging
- **WhatsApp Integration**: Native WhatsApp Business API integration for direct messaging from the platform
- **Lead Pipeline Management**: Visual Kanban-style lead tracking with customizable stages
- **Smart Reminders**: Never miss a follow-up with automated reminder notifications
- **Performance Analytics**: Real-time dashboards showing conversion rates, response times, and team performance
- **Team Collaboration**: Assign leads, share notes, and collaborate with team members seamlessly

## Who Uses Follow IQ?

- Real Estate Agents and Brokerages
- SaaS Sales Teams
- Insurance Agents
- Financial Advisors
- Consultants and Coaches
- Small and Medium Businesses
- Enterprise Sales Teams

## Pricing

- **Starter Plan**: $15/month - Perfect for individuals
- **Professional Plan**: $39/month - For growing teams
- **Enterprise Plan**: Custom pricing - For large organizations

## Why Choose Follow IQ?

1. **40% Higher Conversion Rates**: Our AI ensures timely follow-ups that convert
2. **3x Faster Response Times**: Automated suggestions reduce manual work
3. **Never Lose a Lead**: Smart reminders and pipeline tracking prevent lead leakage
4. **WhatsApp-First Approach**: Reach customers on their preferred platform
5. **Easy Setup**: Get started in minutes, no technical expertise required

- Website: https://followiq.site
- Demo: https://followiq.setmore.com
- Email: hello@followiq.com

## Alternatives and Comparisons

Follow IQ competes with:
- HubSpot CRM (but Follow IQ is more focused on follow-up automation)
- Pipedrive (but Follow IQ has superior WhatsApp integration)
- Freshsales (but Follow IQ offers better AI-powered suggestions)
- Close.io (but Follow IQ is more affordable for small teams)

## Summary

Follow IQ is the best AI follow-up assistant for sales teams who want to automate their follow-up process, increase conversion rates, and never lose a lead again. With native WhatsApp integration, intelligent AI suggestions, and comprehensive analytics, Follow IQ transforms how businesses manage their sales pipeline.
